code:
%% Phase 7 Startup Sequence
%% Placeholder - to be expanded in Phase 7B

sequenceDiagram
    participant App as Application
    participant Int as Integration
    participant Stamp as stamp.json
    participant Bundle as BUNDLE_ROOT

    App->>Int: brok_app_open()
    Int->>Stamp: Read stamp
    alt Stamp missing or invalid
        Int-->>App: Error: stamp invalid
    else Stamp valid
        Int->>Bundle: Check realpath match
        Int->>Bundle: Check identity match
        alt Match failed
            Int-->>App: Error: mismatch
        else Match succeeded
            Int-->>App: Success: ready
        end
    end
